text: Karin Elisabet Lindberg (later Lind√©n; 6 October 1929 - 2 December 2020) was a Swedish gymnast. She competed at the 1948, 1952 (winning gold medal) and 1956 Summer Olympics (winning silver medal). Lindberg died on 2 December 2020, aged 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Sweden Category:Olympic silver medalists for Sweden Category:Swedish gymnasts
title: Karin Lindberg
